name: Blitz Guard
description:
A Souls-like game



Immerse yourself in a challenging world inspired by the acclaimed souls-like genre, featuring a thrilling blend of action and strategy. Blitz Guard will take you on an epic adventure filled with perils and astonishing discoveries.

Face hordes of relentless enemies and colossal bosses in battles brimming with intensity. Unlike traditional games in the genre, in Blitz Guard, you won't rely on healing items. Instead, you must explore the world in search of one-time-use healing fountains, adding an element of resource management and tactical strategy to your gameplay.

Different than other souls-like games



Rather than relying on a shield, you will depend on your skill and reflexes to evade enemy attacks or perform parries with your sword. Master these techniques to survive in the dark and merciless world that awaits you.

In addition to the main challenge of defeating the final boss, you will encounter four formidable major bosses. By defeating them, you will have the opportunity to unlock upgrades and special powers that will aid you in overcoming even more formidable obstacles and enemies.

Parry Gauge



To unleash the special powers, you need to master the "Parry Gauge". This meter fills up with each successful parry, but be careful: a failed parry will decrease it, and taking damage will empty it completely. Balance skill and strategy to keep the meter full and unleash your full potential in thrilling battles!

Bloody Palace



Once you have completed the main storyline, you will unlock the dreaded "Bloody Palace". This additional challenge consists of 51 consecutive rooms filled with relentless enemies. You must conquer them in a single session, with no margin for error. Do you have the bravery and skill to conquer the Bloody Palace and claim ultimate glory?

Made by a Solo Game Developer



Blitz Guard is the result of the hard work of an independent solo developer. Created with limited resources and unwavering dedication on his free time, this indie game shines through its passion. Prepare for an immersive experience that will keep you on the edge of your seat!

Are you ready to face the challenge and explore the hidden secrets in Blitz Guard? Join the adventure now and discover if you have what it takes to survive in this unforgiving world.
